description: Challenge accepted indeed -- Rafael Lords is a little guy, and Leo Alexander presents him with an oh-so very big dick. You really have to admire Rafael’s gusto for not only handling Leo’s meat, but also enjoying all of the work he puts into his encounter. Because his mouth barely fits around it, Rafael uses both oral and hand techniques while working to get Leo Alexander hard. And to what end, you might ask? Skip ahead to 24:12 to see for yourself.
title: Challenge Accepted | Rafael Lords Takes Leo Alexander’s Monster Cock
